actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: To remove the District of Rhode Island from the United States Trustee System until 2002.
short_title: Rhode Island Bankruptcy Court Administration Act of 1991

summary.text: Rhode Island Bankruptcy Court Administration Act of 1991 - Amends the Bankruptcy Judges, United States Trustees, and Family Farmer Bankruptcy Act of 1986 to remove the District of Rhode Island from the United States Trustee System until it elects to be included in the appropriate bankruptcy region or before October 1, 2002, whichever occurs earlier.

titles.title: Rhode Island Bankruptcy Court Administration Act of 1991
To remove the District of Rhode Island from the United States Trustee System until 2002.
